info.name: SPF Record - Detection
author: rxerium
info.description: An SPF TXT record was detected

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54747
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54747
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"brevo-code:6313cd7548a9711f493c5c3e14f0a3f3"
france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=MpwtZ_pw0Y6t1opKmDWfog4m26Hurqy8545cH-c6a3c"
france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.sendinblue.com include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ~all"

info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54747
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:

response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54747
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 3, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"brevo-code:6313cd7548a9711f493c5c3e14f0a3f3"
france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=MpwtZ_pw0Y6t1opKmDWfog4m26Hurqy8545cH-c6a3c"
france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=spf1 include:spf.sendinblue.com include:_spf.alwaysdata.com ~all"

info.name: DNS DMARC - Detect
author: juliosmelo
info.description: DNS DMARC information was detected.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54022
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 54022
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;_dmarc.france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
_dmarc.france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"v=DMARC1; p=none; rua=mailto:rua@dmarc.brevo.com"

info.name: CAA Record
author: pdteam
info.description: A CAA record was discovered. A CAA record is used to specify which certificate authorities (CAs) are allowed to issue certificates for a domain.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 25482
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 25482
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags:; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 CAA

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	dns1.alwaysdata.com. hostmaster.alwaysdata.com. 1723451775 3600 900 1209600 300

france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	NS	dns2.alwaysdata.com.

;france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 MX

france-chaleur-urbaine.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	MX	20 mx2.alwaysdata.com.

info.name: Detect SSL Certificate Issuer
author: lingtren
info.description: Extract the issuer's organization from the target's certificate. Issuers are entities which sign and distribute certificates.

info.name: SSL DNS Names
author: pdteam
info.description: Extract the Subject Alternative Name (SAN) from the target's certificate. SAN facilitates the usage of additional hostnames with the same certificate.

info.name: TLS Version - Detect
author: pdteam
pussycat0x
info.description:
TLS version detection is a security process used to determine the version of the Transport Layer Security (TLS) protocol used by a computer or server.
It is important to detect the TLS version in order to ensure secure communication between two computers or servers.
